references.paper_title: Seam carving for content-aware image resizing
references.reason: This paper introduces the seminal seam carving algorithm, a fundamental technique in image retargeting that many subsequent methods build upon.

references.paper_title: A computational approach to edge detection
references.reason: Canny edge detection is a classic computer vision technique used for feature extraction in various image processing applications, including image retargeting which relies on accurate edge detection for better seam selection.

Generative adversarial networks (GANs) are a powerful class of generative models which have been widely used in image generation and are increasingly applied to image retargeting for improved visual quality.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a cutting-edge image generation model based on diffusion processes which has been extensively used in various applications including the adaptive repainting module in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a powerful model that bridges natural language and images. It is used for the image-guided repainting module in the proposed method to effectively guide the generation based on the original image.
